pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

bors d+

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (constVAdd k P₁ v).toAffineEquiv = .constVAdd k P₁ v := rfl ```

Should these be:
```suggestion
  continuous_toFun : Continuous toFun := by fun_prop
  continuous_invFun : Continuous invFun := by fun_prop
```
(ask on Zulip if you're not sure either)
Good question: as-is, this failed to prove continuity for `refl`, so I'm leaving it as-is. (But asking why would be a great follow-up question!)

If it's not used and cannot be `simp` then let's kill it:
```suggestion
```

```suggestion
instance instEquivLike : EquivLike (P₁ ≃ᵃL[k] P₂) P₁ P₂ where
```

Feel free to add them but I don't think this comment is necessary
```suggestion
```

I believe what you have is correct
```suggestion
```

You set up custom simps projections above, right?
```suggestion
```
Feel free to add the other missing lemmas but I don't think we should leave comments like this lying around, not least because it's too easy for them to get out of sync with the code.
